entry.title: Why is Artificial Intelligence So Useless for Business?
entry.quote: AI research has structural problems that limit how much it can impact business. But understanding why gives a way to determine what will work and what won't, as well as reveal new business opportunities.

entry.title: Glamorous Toolkit
entry.quote: Glamorous Toolkit is the moldable development environment. It is a live notebook. It is a flexible search interface. It is a fancy code editor. It is a software analysis platform. It is a data visualization engine. All in one.

entry.title: The largest collection of startup pitch decks
entry.quote: 600+ decks from the world's best startups.

entry.title: Wish You Were Here: Context-Aware Human Generation
entry.quote: We present a novel method for inserting objects, specifically humans, into existing images, such that they blend in a photorealistic manner, while respecting the semantic context of the scene.

entry.title: How I would put voice control in everything
entry.quote: Why can’t I point at a lamp and say “on”“ and the light come on? Or point at my stove and say “5 minutes”? Or just look at it and talk, if my hands are full.
